Blundstones are well known for being the “wear anywhere, do anything” shoes. They’re incredibly versatile, wildly durable, and very, very comfortable, especially when paired with the proper inserts. And if you do, the arch of your foot will likely touch the top of your shoe, resulting in the boots being more uncomfortable than they were in the first place. For the best replacement insoles for Blundstones, opt for a low-profile pair. The right inserts can still offer plenty of cushion and robust support in a slim package.
